message: Let's get this started! I'm willing to give you a decent share, but I'm not going to give you all the money.
You're starting high, I'll meet you in the middle!
You think you're meeting me in the middle, but you're still leaving me with too little. I'll hold out for more.
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a bit more to make it worth my while.
I'm getting a bit desperate, but I'll try to be reasonable
You're right, you're getting desperate, and I think I can live with this. Let's call it a day.
